scripts.all:install: npm run store:install && npm run customer:install
scripts.all:compile: npm run store:compile && npm run customer:compile
scripts.all:bundle: npm run store:bundle && npm run customer:bundle
scripts.all:copy: npm run store:copy && npm run customer:copy
scripts.bundle: npm run all:bundle npm run all:copy
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bundle
scripts.dev: rm -rf ../server/src/main/resources/ui/ && mkdir ../server/src/main/resources/ui/ && npm run build && cp -rf ./dist/* ../server/src/main/resources/ui/ && npm run server
